pages.text: $(li)The Luck of the Sea enchantment can be applied in a Fishing Rod.$(br)$(li)This enchantment increases the possibilities of have good loot when you are fishing.
pages.title: Luck of the Sea

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level III.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level IV of this enchantment using an Ancient Tome (Luck of the Sea).
